description: A BridgeConstructiveElement is an element of a bridge which is essential from a structural point of view. Examples are pylons, anchorages, slabs, beams.

properties.name: class
properties.description: Indicates the specific type of the BridgeConstructiveElement.

properties.name: function
properties.description: Specifies the intended purposes of the BridgeConstructiveElement.

properties.name: usage
properties.description: Specifies the actual uses of the BridgeConstructiveElement.

properties.name: lod1Geometry
properties.description: Relates to a 3D geometry that represents the BridgeConstructiveElement in Level of Detail 1. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod2Geometry
properties.description: Relates to a 3D geometry that represents the BridgeConstructiveElement in Level of Detail 2. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod3Geometry
properties.description: Relates to a 3D geometry that represents the BridgeConstructiveElement in Level of Detail 3. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod4Geometry
properties.description: Relates to a 3D geometry that represents the BridgeConstructiveElement in Level of Detail 4. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod4TerrainIntersectionCurve
properties.description: Relates to a 3D MultiCurve geometry that represents the terrain intersection curve of the BridgeConstructiveElement in Level of Detail 4. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod4ImplicitRepresentation
properties.description: Relates to an implicit geometry that represents the BridgeConstructiveElement in Level of Detail 4. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.
